newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yeltsin signs decrees on Valdai trip - press office.
newsitem.headline: Yeltsin signs decrees on Valdai trip - press office.

text.p: President Boris Yeltsin, resting in the Valdai lakelands of northwestern Russia, signed two decrees on Wednesday, the presidential press service said.
Asked about rumours in Western financial markets that Yeltsin was dead, a spokesman answered: "I am firmly convinced that he is alive. He has been signing decrees."

One decree, outlined by Itar-Tass news agency, relieved new ministers Alexander Livshits and Viktor Ilyushin of their old jobs as presidential aides. The second one dealt with the budget of the federal social fund.
